segments.text: I can't believe my eyesâ€”water's gushing out of that sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on full blast, and no one's stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, but she's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's spreading across the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, behind her, kids are raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balanced on a stool that's tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, palm out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How did I not see this chaos coming?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a perfect garden, so normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything inside is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected such a mix of calm and calamity.
segments.speaker: PAR
